title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They've tried resetting their password multiple times but still facing issues.

title: Payment Not Going Through
description: Payment gateway returns an error when user attempts to pay via credit card.

title: App Crash on Launch
description: Mobile app crashes immediately after launch on Android devices.

title: Email Notifications Not Received
description: Users are reporting they don’t receive order confirmation emails.

title: Broken Image Links on Homepage
description: Homepage banner images are not loading properly on desktop browsers.

title: Subscription Auto-Renew Failed
description: Automatic renewal didn’t process for multiple users this month.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Not Working
description: Customer cannot receive 2FA codes through SMS or email.

title: Delayed Order Delivery
description: Customer order marked as shipped but has no tracking update for 5 days.

title: Website Loading Slowly
description: Several users reported slow page load times, especially during checkout.

title: Profile Picture Upload Error
description: Users receive an error when uploading new profile pictures.

title: Duplicate Charges on Account
description: Customer was billed twice for the same transaction.

title: Live Chat Widget Not Responding
description: Live chat bubble is visible but doesn’t open on click.

title: Invoice Download Fails
description: Users are unable to download invoices from their billing history.

title: Search Function Returns No Results
description: Product search bar is not displaying results even when items exist.

title: Broken Link in Footer
description: Support link in the website footer redirects to a 404 page.
